title: Frozen Turtle Shell
summaries: The Frozen Turtle Shell is a Hardmode accessory that has a 1*1/100 (1%) chance of being dropped by the Ice Tortoise, an enemy found in the Ice biome. It grants the Ice Barrier buff when equipped, with the effects varying between versions:

• Gives 25% damage reduction as long as their health remains at or below 50%.
  • Gives the player 30 defense when below 25% health.
While not normally visible, it displays as a small blue circle spinning around the character that emits light when active.

statistics.Tooltip: Puts a shell around the owner when below 50% life that reduces damage by 25%
